basics.name: Carlos Marques
basics.label: Software Engineer and Game Developer
basics.summary: A Master in Computer Science from Instituto Superior Técnico with a passion for programming and gaming.

work.name: Gamedev Técnico
work.summary: Pitched and am currently leading the team developing Paper Park: a 3D collect-a-thon platformer, set it an arts and crafts theme park diorama, developed in Unreal Engine 5. I’ve overseen producing the game and producing documentation like the GDD, bibles, and storyboards, as well as coordinating the team. Though I’ve also written Blueprint code and have experience with the engine.

work.name: Gamedev Técnico
work.summary:
Gamedev Técnico is a student body within Instituto Superior Técnico, with the goal of making games. In GDT, I have participated in 20 game jams (and counting), as a game designer and programmer. I've also done art, level, systems, and audio design. 
 I've led teams of people new to game development and mentored them to positive jam experiences.

work.name: Instituto Superior Técnico
work.summary: Helped and taught high school students through a Gamemaker Studio 2 tutorial for a week. Also answered their questions and helped them bug-fix so they could create the game to their liking.

education.institution: Faculdade de Ciências da Universidade de Lisboa
